title: Looking For a Duo Partner to help me Climb.

embed.description: ShadowAquarius / Silver 4 0LP / 14W 18L Win Ratio 44% / Tristana - 7W 7L Win Ratio 50%, Blitzcrank - 5W 6L Win Ratio 45%, Zyra - 3W 7L Win Ratio 30%, Lucian - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%, Thresh - 0W 1L Win Ratio 0%

body:
I'm Currently in Silver 4 looking to climb a little bit. I can play Tristana and going to endeavour to learn twitch, can also play Support (Zyra, BlitzCrank & Thresh), could also play Nunu top as a last resort.

Comment Your Ranks and In-Game name, what positions you play and your champ pool.

IGN-ShadowAquarius.

replies.body: Can play with you on my smurf if you're on in the morning. Only requirement is you go ardent support for me. <3
Will add your Smurf, will just need the Username. :)

OK, I'm two elos behind you. But I share your interest in climbing a little bit. I'm a Bronze 1 support main who can play jungle, adc and mid at a decent level. My champion pool mostly consists of Lulu (my best support), Janna, Sona, Xayah (my best adc), Tristana, Ashe, Lux (my best midlaner), Ahri and Warwick (my only jungle lol). I'm trying to learn other champions as well, as well as the mechanics of toplane. Feel free to add me if you wanna duo or flex or whatever. My in-game name is checkeredartist.
hey i am b4 so i cant do anything but i can teach u to master twitch as i am m7 and know everything about him
Would like to learn a bit more about Twitch so will send you an add.
